'''Paul Spooner''' is a 3D artist notable for his contributions to the global environmental elements of ''Minecraft'', specifically the large [[trees]].<ref>{{Tumblr|notch|506311060|Still going slow, but here’s a new screenshot!|April 8, 2010|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/http://notch.tumblr.com/post/506311060/still-going-slow-but-heres-a-new-screenshot}}</ref> 

== Contributions ==
{{Expand section}}
After being disappointed with his inability to build a tree fort in the small trees, he wrote a map modding tool which was then partially included in the base game.<ref>{{Citation|url=http://www.peripheralarbor.com/minecraft/minecraftscriptphotojournal.html|title=Minecraft Script Pictures|author=Paul Spooner|website=Paul Spooner's Personal Website|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.peripheralarbor.com/minecraft/minecraftscriptphotojournal.html}}</ref> 

== Trivia ==
* Unlike [[Daniel Rosenfeld]], Spooner's in-game character does not have a [[Mojang cape]].
